However, to the best of our knowledge, there has been no work yet on whether generated queries can also be...

items.abstract: This paper presents our recent initiatives to foster the discoverability of new releases on the music streaming service Deezer. items.abstract: Query performance prediction (QPP) is a core task in information retrieval (IR) that aims at predicting the retrieval quality for a given query without relevance judgments. QPP has been investigated for decades and has witnessed a surge in research activity in recent years; QPP has been shown to ben...

In this work, we propose an on-device QAC method that runs directly on users\u2019 d...
